Description
Ability
Use this enum to represent abilities.
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
The Actor class represents a GameEntity that can perform an Action.
ActorAttribute<T>
An interface that represents an attribute of an actor.

Represents a bimap of locations and actors.

Application
The main class to start the game.

An action for dropping an item from the actor's inventory.
EatAction
An action for eating a specific item that can restore or boost the player's stats.

Class that represents a route from one Location to another.

Fire
Represents a fire on the game map.
Flask
Represents a base class for flasks in the game.
FlaskAction
An action that allows the player to use a flask to restore their mana and hit points.
FlaskOfHealing
A specific type of Flask that provides healing to a player.
FlaskOfRejuvenation
A specific type of Flask that restores mana to a player.

Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
FollowBehaviour
A behaviour that enables an actor to follow a target actor (usually a player) within a certain range.
FurnaceGolem
Class representing the Furnace Golem.
GameEntity
Base class for all objects that can exist in the game.
GameMap
Class representing one map within the system.
GreatKnife
Represents a powerful weapon, the Great Knife, in the game.

Player
Class representing the Player character.
Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.

A class that represents a random puddle of water.

Represents a Shadowtree Fragment item that can be consumed by a player.

Represents a powerful weapon, the Short Sword, in the game.

Status
Use this enum class to represent various statuses.
StatusEffect
Abstract class that represents a status effect that an actor may have For example: an actor might be poisoned after consuming an item.

Wall

Wallet
A class that represents a wallet that can be used to store the game's currency.
WanderBehaviour
This class defines the behavior of an Actor that makes it wander to a random location on the map if possible.

World
Za Warudo! - DIO Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
